org.digijava.kernel.lucene.impl.org

Class LucOrganisationModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.lucene.impl.org.LucOrganisationModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, LucModule<AmpOrganisation>

    public class LucOrganisationModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements LucModule<AmpOrganisation>
    Organization module for lucene. NOTE: This is reference implementation, not used anywhere yet. Please move to correct package if you decide to use and change this.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
